title: Can you still get demoted from S5 to B1?
body: Title says it all. I haven't played ranked in a long time so can someone fill me in?

replies.body: yea u can but you have to be reallllllly bad.
you won't drop below platium but if you got bad MMR hehe, they will do that. check your mmr at OP.GG.COM

No there is no decay below Plat, so you can't get demoted for not playing. HOWEVER you can get demoted if your MMR becomes that of the 5th division of the tier below yours. So in order to drop from S5 to B1 you have to have B5 MMR.

Match Making Rating. Its a hidden number that basically decides who you get matched up with. The more you win, the higher your number, the more you lose, the lower your number.

You can tell if you have good MMR or not by how much LP you gain for wins and how much you lose for losses. If you are gaining more LP for a win then you lose for a loss than you have good MMR and will probably climb to higher rank fast.
If its roughly the same you have average MMR and are in the league where you belong.
if you lose more than you gain you have bad MMR and you will probably drop divisions soon.
